item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 7:50, so let's meet right inside the theater doors (or right outside if it's not freezing out) at 7:15.

As always, exact change ($8.50) makes me like you more. I also have small popcorn and small soda vouchers for $3 each, if you'd like to save a bit o' green on snacks.

See you on Friday!!!

Call my cell if you get lost, have a last-minute RSVP (either way) or are running late: 508/308-4897.

--Dana




OLD STUFF:
Let's head to The Reader, a Kate Winslet drama/romance.

Summary:
When he falls ill on his way home from school, 15 year-old Michael Berg is rescued by Hanna, a woman twice his age. The two begin an unexpected and passionate affair only for Hanna to suddenly and inexplicably disappear. Eight years later, Michael, now a young law student observing Nazi war trials, meets his former lover again, under very different circumstances. Hanna is on trial for a hideous crime, and as she refuses to defend herself, Michael gradually realizes his boyhood love may be guarding a secret she considers to be more shameful than murder.

Let's plan on the 7:00ish show. I'll update a few days before with exact times.

As always, guests are welcome. Just be sure to include them in your RSVP so that I know how many to expect.

And we'll head to Friday's after the movie, if anyone's game for that.

Please call me with any last-minute RSVPs (after 5:00 on the 20th) or directions if you get lost. 508-308-4897.

See you soon!

--Dana
item.name: The Reader
